name: eric-adp-gui-aggregator-service
description: Lightweight GUI Aggregator Service. Contains the GUI Aggregator service backend and the Common Launcher Portal.

scripts.install:all: npm run install:root && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:server && npm run install:integration && npm run install:apiDocs && npm run install:mocks && npm run install:loadTest
scripts.ci:mocks: cd mock/domain-ui-generic && npm ci --prefer-offline --no-audit --legacy-peer-dep && npm run install:uiMocks
scripts.ci:all: npm run ci:root && concurrently npm:ci:frontend npm:ci:server npm:ci:integration npm:ci:apiDocs npm:ci:mocks npm:ci:loadTest
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules && rm -rf integration-tests/node_modules && rm -rf docs/api/node_modules && npm --prefix mock/domain-ui-generic run clean:all && rm -rf load-test/node_modules
scripts.outdated:all: npm run outdated:frontend && npm run outdated:server && npm run outdated:root && npm run outdated:integration && npm run outdated:apiDocs && npm run outdated:mocks && npm run outdated:loadTest
scripts.update:all: npm run update:frontend && npm run update:server && npm run update:root && npm run update:integration && npm run update:apiDocs && npm run update:mocks && npm run update:loadTest
scripts.lint:package-lock: lockfile-lint -p package-lock.json && lockfile-lint -p backend/package-lock.json && lockfile-lint -p frontend/package-lock.json && lockfile-lint -p integration-tests/package-lock.json && lockfile-lint -p docs/api/package-lock.json
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:server && npm run lint:markdown && npm run lint:package-lock && npm run lint:apiDocs
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && npm run test:install && npm run test
scripts.perf:test:ui: cd load-test && npm run test:install && npm run perf-test
